Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1970...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1971 (Going to STL: P T. Forster. Going to CHC: P D. Hughes, 2B B. Allen)...
Injured on 5/10/1971 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/11/1971 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/1/1972 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 8 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Cleveland on 1/31/1976 (Going to STL: LF T. Grieve. Going to CLE: P T. Forster, P B. Castro, P B. Apodaca)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1976, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1976, winning 2 games with a 2.25 ERA...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (A) on 9/20/1978...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/14/1980 to a 2-year deal worth $12,150,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1980, going 5-1, 1.80...
Injured on 5/21/1980 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/1981 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Struck out 15 batters against Baltimore on 5/21/1989...
Injured on 9/1/1989 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1992, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Injured on 8/18/1992 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
